Package com.teamfour.monopolish.lobby

Class LobbyDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamfour.monopolish.database.DataAccessObject
      • com.teamfour.monopolish.lobby.LobbyDAO
  • public class LobbyDAO
extends DataAccessObject
    Handles all database communication to the Lobby table in the database

        public int insertLobby​(java.lang.String username)

        Returns:
